data.message:
•	Serious inquiries please!!!!
Looking for a job, and can't find one, well I was the same way searching and searching till I finally found this great opportunity to make money online. And I'm making a great paycheck every Friday, while sitting at home. If anyone is interested this is not a scam you don't have to package anything or chase people around simply market on the Internet. Send me a friend request and a message and I will get you started today so you can have your paycheck by Friday. Only available to limited amount of people and in the USA and Canada!!! Please serious candidates only!!!
